title: The 7 Steps to Building Incredible Websites
description: Step 1: You have to define your project. This step requires many questions. What’s the main goal of the site? What’s the main ...

author.name: Richard Busato
author.description: Hi, I am Richard Busato. I'm a Web and iOS App Developer, and I’m also studying Mechatronics Engineering. I recently fell in love with Design. I love to share my experiences and prove that Anyone Can Do Anything -- No excuses.
